description: This file defines a mock class for unit testing purposes, specifically mocking the `VideoDFC` functionality using Google Mock framework. The class `VideoDFCMock` inherits from `device::VideoDFCImpl` and includes a mocked method `getName`.

classes.name: VideoDFCMock
classes.description: A mock class used for unit testing, inherits from `device::VideoDFCImpl` and mocks the `getName` method.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: A mocked method that returns a constant reference to a std::string, overriding the base class's method.
